devdoc.author: Llydia Cross
devdoc.details: Allows content owners to add pre-validated links the user can add to their destinations field, contract creator sets links through build tools
devdoc.title: InfinityMint Linker

clearLinks().notice: used by build tools to redeploy

erc721Location().notice: the location of the main ERC721 contract

forceLink(uint256,string,address).notice: Can be called by other contracts who are approved

setLink(uint256,string,address).notice: has to be called by token owner

toggleSupport(uint256).notice: disables this link from being used in the future

userdoc.notice: Serves as a utility contract which manages the destinations field of an InfinityMint token
